languages.text: "Великолепный узор изуродует даже малое пятно гнили. Слабость — это врата в душу, что держим мы открытыми для греха. Слабость истекает из желаний. Убей желания — и слабость умрет".

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."
languages.original_text: "Великолепный узор изуродует даже малое пятно гнили. Слабость — это врата в душу, что держим мы открытыми для греха. Слабость истекает из желаний. Убей желания — и слабость умрет".

traits.locale_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. Weakness is born of desires. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die with them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. They who are weak in body will win with only their will-power for a weapon. For everyone has their strengths and their weaknesses; what matters is how we perceive and accept them. How we reinforce and use them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will along die with them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Those who are weak in body can still win armed with only their willpower. For everyone has their strengths and their weaknesses, but what matters is how we perceive and accept them. How we reinforce them and use them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. Weakness is born of desires. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die with them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will along die with them."

"The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

languages.text: "Die kleinste Spur von Fäulnis reicht aus, um jedes noch so schön gewobene Muster zu zerstören. Schwäche ist ein Portal in die Seele, das wir für neue Verfehlungen offen halten. Es wird aus Begierde geboren. Tötet Ihr Eure Begierden, stirbt Eure Schwäche mit ihnen."
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

traits.locale_text: "Die kleinste Spur von Fäulnis reicht aus, um jedes noch so schön gewobene Muster zu zerstören. Schwäche ist ein Portal in die Seele, das wir für neue Verfehlungen offen halten. Es wird aus Begierde geboren. Tötet Ihr Eure Begierden, stirbt Eure Schwäche mit ihnen."

languages.text: «La mancha de putrefacción más minúscula basta para arruinar el tejido más hermoso. La debilidad es una vía de acceso al alma, y si la mantenemos abierta nos conducirá al fracaso. Nace del deseo. Suprima sus deseos, y su debilidad morirá con ellos».
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

traits.locale_text: «La mancha de putrefacción más minúscula basta para arruinar el tejido más hermoso. La debilidad es una vía de acceso al alma, y si la mantenemos abierta nos conducirá al fracaso. Nace del deseo. Suprima sus deseos, y su debilidad morirá con ellos».

languages.text: 「どんなに小さな腐敗の染みであっても、最高に美しい織り模様を台無しにしてしまうのです。弱さは魂への進入路であり、次の失敗のために開いておくべきものです。そして、それは欲望から生まれます。欲望を殺せば、弱さも共に死ぬでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

traits.locale_text: 「どんなに小さな腐敗の染みであっても、最高に美しい織り模様を台無しにしてしまうのです。弱さは魂への進入路であり、次の失敗のために開いておくべきものです。そして、それは欲望から生まれます。欲望を殺せば、弱さも共に死ぬでしょう」

languages.text: “即便是最微不足道的污渍，也足以毁掉最美妙的图案。弱点源于欲望，它会打开通往灵魂的大门，为灵魂带来灾祸。只要消灭欲望，弱点也会随之消亡。”
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

traits.locale_text: “即便是最微不足道的污渍，也足以毁掉最美妙的图案。弱点源于欲望，它会打开通往灵魂的大门，为灵魂带来灾祸。只要消灭欲望，弱点也会随之消亡。”

languages.text: « La plus infime trace de corruption suffit à ruiner les étoffes les plus précieuses. La faiblesse est une porte ouverte sur l'âme, une brèche par laquelle s'introduisent de nouveaux manquements. Le pur produit du désir. Éliminez vos désirs, et votre faiblesse disparaîtra avec eux. »
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."

traits.locale_text: « La plus infime trace de corruption suffit à ruiner les étoffes les plus précieuses. La faiblesse est une porte ouverte sur l'âme, une brèche par laquelle s'introduisent de nouveaux manquements. Le pur produit du désir. Éliminez vos désirs, et votre faiblesse disparaîtra avec eux. »

languages.text: "Ufacık bir çürük zerresi, en güzel örülen motifi mahvetmeye yeter de artar bile. Zayıflık, ruha açılan bir geçittir. Bu geçidi yeni kusurlar için açık tutarız. Bu geçit, arzudan doğar. Arzularınızı ortadan kaldırın ki zayıflığınız da onlarla birlikte yok olsun."
languages.original_text: "The smallest stain of rot is enough to ruin the most beautiful woven pattern. Weakness is a gateway into the soul, one we hold open for new failings. It is born of desire. Kill your desires, and your weakness will die along with them."
